channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache StreamPipes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache StreamPipes

item.title: CVE-2023-31469|2023-06-23T07:07:42.875Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20streampipes
item.description: A REST interface in Apache StreamPipes (versions 0.69.0 to 0.91.0) was not properly restricted to admin-only access. This allowed a non-admin user with valid login credentials to elevate privileges beyond the initially assigned roles. The issue is resolved by upgrading to StreamPipes 0.92.0.
